remarks: The last symbol of a word concatenated with the subword of the word having length less by 1 than the word results in the word itself.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Oct-2018.)
statement: ccats1swrdeq $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ U e. Word V /\ ( # ` U ) = ( ( # ` W ) + 1 ) ) -> ( W = ( U substr <. 0 , ( # ` W ) >. ) -> U = ( W ++ <" ( lastS ` U ) "> ) ) ) $.
